text: Andriy Ivanovych Sadovyi (; born 19 August 1968) is a Ukrainian politician. He is the mayor of Lviv,Exit poll: Klitschko and Sadoviy re-elected mayors of Kyiv and Lviv, Filatov to head Dnipropetrovsk, Kyiv Post (15 November 2015) the administrative center of the Lviv Oblast of western Ukraine, and the leader of the Self Reliance political party.Can Lviv Mayor Change Ukrainian Politics Once And For All?, Radio Free Europe/Radio Liberty (31 October 2014) ==References== == Other websites == * Mayor of Lviv at Lviv City Council site * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian mayors Category:Politicians from Lviv
title: Andriy Sadovyi
